params.amounts: of the tokens for each receiver.
params.borrower: The address of the contract that implements and conforms to `IBatchFlashBorrower` and handles the flashloan.
params.data: The calldata to pass to the `borrower` contract.
params.receivers: An array of the token receivers. A one-to-one mapping with `tokens` and `amounts`.

params.amount: Token amount in native representation to deposit.
params.from: which account to pull the tokens.
params.share: Token amount represented in shares to deposit. Takes precedence over `amount`.
params.to: which account to push the tokens.

returns.shareOut: The deposited amount repesented in shares.

params.borrower: The address of the contract that implements and conforms to `IFlashBorrower` and handles the flashloan.
params.data: The calldata to pass to the `borrower` contract.
params.token: The address of the token to receive.

params.balance: True if housekeeping should be done.
params.maxChangeAmount: The maximum amount for either pulling or pushing from/to the `IStrategy` contract.
params.token: The address of the token for which a strategy is deployed.

setStrategy(address,address).details: Only the owner of this contract is allowed to change this.

params.newStrategy: The address of the contract that conforms to `IStrategy`.
params.token: The address of the token that maps to a strategy to change.

setStrategyTargetPercentage(address,uint.details: Only the owner of this contract is allowed to change this.

params.targetPercentage_: The new target in percent. Must be lesser or equal to `MAX_TARGET_PERCENTAGE`.
params.token: The address of the token that maps to a strategy to change.

toAmount(address,uint256,bool).details: Helper function represent shares back into the `token` amount.

params.roundUp: If the result should be rounded up.

returns.amount: The share amount back into native representation.

toShare(address,uint256,bool).details: Helper function to represent an `amount` of `token` in shares.

params.roundUp: If the result `share` should be rounded up.

returns.share: The token amount represented in shares.

params.from: which user to pull the tokens.
params.to: which user to push the tokens.

params.from: which user to pull the tokens.
params.shares: The amount of `token` in shares for each receiver in `tos`.

params.amount: of tokens. Either one of `amount` or `share` needs to be supplied.
params.from: which user to pull the tokens.
params.share: Like above, but `share` takes precedence over `amount`.
params.to: which user to push the tokens.

batchFlashLoan(address,address[],address.notice: Support for batched flashloans. Useful to request multiple different `tokens` in a single transaction.

deposit(address,address,address,uint256,.notice: Deposit an amount of `token` represented in either `amount` or `share`.

harvest(address,bool,uint256).notice: The actual process of yield farming. Executes the strategy of `token`. Optionally does housekeeping if `balance` is true. `maxChangeAmount` is relevant for skimming or withdrawing if `balance` is true.

setStrategy(address,address).notice: Sets the contract address of a new strategy that conforms to `IStrategy` for `token`. Must be called twice with the same arguments. A new strategy becomes pending first and can be activated once `STRATEGY_DELAY` is over.

setStrategyTargetPercentage(address,uint.notice: Sets the target percentage of the strategy for `token`.

transfer(address,address,address,uint256.notice: Transfer shares from a user account to another one.

transferMultiple(address,address,address.notice: Transfer shares from a user account to multiple other ones.

withdraw(address,address,address,uint256.notice: Withdraws an amount of `token` from a user account.

userdoc.notice: The BentoBox is a vault for tokens. The stored tokens can be flash loaned and used in strategies. Yield from this will go to the token depositors. Rebasing tokens ARE NOT supported and WILL cause loss of funds. Any funds transfered directly onto the BentoBox will be lost, use the deposit function instead.
